prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a stoic, imposing assassin, deep purple skin tone, sharp angular facial features, short dark hair, wearing a textured dark grey/black futuristic trench coat
feature_prompt: detailed leather/fabric texture of the coat, subtle biological texture on the purple skin, sharp focus on the face and collar
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, bright purple, flat color, blurry coat, low quality, human skin color
